abstract: Henry R. Kravis has pledged $100 million to Columbia Business School, the largest gift in the school’s history.
snippet: Henry R. Kravis has pledged $100 million to Columbia Business School, the largest gift in the school’s history.
lead_paragraph: 8:08 p.m. | Updated Henry R. Kravis, the billionaire private equity executive, has pledged $100 million to Columbia Business School, the largest gift in the school’s history and the biggest donation he has ever made.

headline.main: Kravis Gives $100 Million to Columbia B-School

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
